definition[0]: to make someone give clear details or make a definite decision about something
example[1]: Did you manage to pin him down to a definite date?
definition[1]: to understand something clearly or be able to describe it exactly
example[2]: The flavour was hard to pin down.
definition[2]: if soldiers etc involved in fighting are pinned down, they cannot move from their position because someone is shooting at them
example[3]: The rebels have been pinned down in a camp to the south of the river.
